Parts List for DB25m F4Lite THT V1

Through-hole parts:

0ZRR0050FF1E fuse, x1
SB130-T diodes, x1 (any schottky with 800mA+ rating ought to be fine)
LD1117V adjustable linear regulator x1
MFS1/4DCT52R1200F 120 ohm resistor for position R2, x1
MFR-25FBF52-154R 154 ohm resistor for position R1, x1
^  These resistor *values* are non-negotiable, but their physical sizing can differ
4610X-101-111LF 110 ohm resistor network, x2
DB25 connector:
* Tons of different types of these around, many are compatible with the basic footprint
** Just be sure it's the "male" style
* https://www.aliexpress.com/item/33052204297.html

Microcontroller Module:
STM32F401 "Green Pill", this is the one you're looking for: https://stm32-base.org/boards/STM32F401CCU6-STM32-Mini-F401
* Search Amazon or eBay for "STM32F401"
* https://www.aliexpress.com/item/1005001639712812.html

Surface-Mount parts:
Five 1206 size 22uF capacitors, 10+ volt rating (higher voltage rating is better, I used 25V)
Molex 105162-0001 MicroSD Card Slot
